transcript:
Customer: Yaar phone dena yaar kahan hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, SM Choudhary se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Ji, ji.
Executive: Ji very good afternoon sir, main Aasim Khan bol raha tha IndiaMART se business manager. Aapki company register hai IndiaMART ke sath mein sir?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To jo aapka account dekhte hain na IndiaMART mein, main unka business manager baat kar raha tha. Service ke regarding maine call kiya tha. Actually aapka feedback yahan par aaya hua tha. Services ko lekar aapka to isliye maine sir aapse baat karna chahi sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To jaise sir yahan main dekh raha tha aapka feedback aaya hua tha IndiaMART par service ko lekar dissatisfied. To isliye sir main baat karna chah raha tha sir kya issue aa raha hai kuch business ko lekar jaise aapne yahan mention kiya hua hai. To usi ke regarding taaki sir usme agar koi issue ho ya problem hai to uske upar kaam kiya ja sake sir.
Customer: Achcha bhaiya, agar aap meri problem solve kar do to bahut achcha rahega. Ye mere ko jo wo dete hain, jo mere ko wo dete hain jise mujhe supply karna ho 50 kilo hai na, do quintal, teen quintal. Ab batao ye main kaise bheju? Mera bulk product hai aur factory meri bahut badi.
Executive: Sir badi hai lekin sir to mere ko mere ko bade orders chahiye chahe wo Jammu Kashmir ke ho.
Executive: Main aapki baat ko bilkul samajh raha hun.
Customer: Punjab ke ho. Har insan yahi sochta hai ke bade bade order yani jitne bhi hain wo bhi aaye. Lekin sir kya hota hai har buyer aisa nahi hota ke har insan bade hi order book kare. Kabhi kabhi sir aisa bhi hota hai man lo main aapse pehli baar deal kar raha hun to mere mind mein ye rahega chalega ke pata nahi kya quality hogi time pe deliver hoga ya nahi hoga kaisa hoga. To wo chhote order bhi mangate hain unko lagta hai ki ha quality wagera sab kuch theek hai time pe deliver kara fir wahi log bada order bhi mangate hain sir. To isliye sir kabhi ye bhi lagta hai and jaise bade order ke upar aap focus karte hain main aapki baat ko bilkul samajh raha hun jo aapne mujhe bataya lekin bade order sir limited hote hain. Aisa nahi hota hai ke sare hi order bade hi bade honge. Bade order agar sir man lo market mein wholesaler koi baitha hua hai to sir wholesaler ke sath sath trader aur retailer bhi baithe hue hain sir. Is vajah se sir wo bade order kabhi kabhi sir aap check karte hoge to shayad wo aapko na dikhte ho ya available wahan na ho lekin sir hum log active rahenge jaise sir aaj ki date mein bhi main dekh raha hun aapne ek order ek se do lakh ka consume kara hai sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Vermi compost ka. To wo sir jaise jaise aap active rahoge jaise jaise aap active rahoge customer se baat karoge to wahi customer sir yani ki jo aaj ₹1 lakh ka de raha hai agar ya ₹50000 ka order de raha hai ya ₹40000 ka ya ₹30000 ka order de raha hai agar hum usko time pe delivery ho rahi hai usko bilkul trust hamare upar hoga ki bhai jis party se maine deal kar raha hun wo bilkul genuine party hai. Waise sir aapke man mein aisa kuch nahi hai ki bhai main kisi bar ka paisa mar lunga ya usko pareshan karunga kyunki aap bhi ek businessman ho aap bhi vyapari ho sir business hona chahoge. Lekin buyer sir agar pehli baar sir main aapse deal kar raha hun to main ₹2-3 lakh ya ₹4 lakh ₹5 lakh ka order dete hue 10 baar sochunga zarur ki pata nahi main itna bada order de raha hun time pe deliver hoga nahi hoga jo quality sample mein dikhai hai wo aayegi nahi aayegi to pehle main aisa karta hun chalo ₹20-50000 ka order mangata hun agar sab kuch theek hua to future mein main inka bada order bhi dunga. Wahi customer sir repeat bhi hote kyunki IndiaMART par sir wo customer to nahi aate hain jo ek baar ya do baar mal lete hain yahan regular customer aata hai sir aur agar aap dekhoge na sir agar aap apna past history dekhenge to sir wahan par kareeb 40 30 to 40% 40% aisi buylead aapne uthai hain jo bade order ki bhi hain ₹1 lakh ki ₹2 lakh ki ₹5 lakh ki ₹3 lakh ki ₹4 lakh ki lekin wahi main bar bar aapko bol raha hun kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai ke bade order ki buyleads kam hoti kyunki bade order ke customer hi sir market mein kam hote hain sir.
Customer: Theek hai. Main abhi tak ye samajhta tha ho sakta hai mujhe chhat chhat ke dete ho.
Executive: Na sir Malik sir aisa aisa kuch nahi hota sir dekho isme aisa kuch nahi hota system kya dekho sorry main aapko beech mein rok raha hun maafi chahunga maine aapko beech mein roka dekho jo direct calls aati hain kisi buyer ne aapko samne se call kara to wo depend karta hai wo aap hi ko call kar raha hai ya kisi aur ko kar raha hai to wo us buyer ke upar depend karta hai lekin agar koi buyleads ya inquiry post ho rahi hai to buyleads kya hoti hai sir wo sare hi supplier ko ek sath jati hai chahe aap ₹25000 chahe wo aap jo service chala rahe ho ₹28000 saal ki chahe wo service ho ya fir chahe aap jo aur supplier hai jo ₹10 lakh mahine ki saal ki service chala rahe hain chahe wo service kyunki buyleads jo hoti hai wo software allocate karta hai aur wo sare supplier ko ek sath dikhti hai bas ye rehta hai ke ek buylead ko maximum paanch chhe log hi consume kar sakte hain usse zyada consume nahi kar sakte.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To agar aap active rahoge service ko ab to jab se maine kara hai char paanch din se main khush hun IndiaMART se teen customer mil gaye aur kya chahiye.
Executive: Nahi sir dekho hamari to main khush hun aapko koi complaint nahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Chaliye achi sir hamari puri koshish yahi rehti hai ki hum aapko achi leads aur proper buyleads wagera provide kare lekin sir aap bhi samajh sakte ho jaise bhaiya ek minute main aapko rok raha hun jaise aap teen char din guzre hain kaash agar ye rahe to main fir renew kara lunga.
Executive: Maza aa jayega IndiaMART aap bilkul sir bilkul befikar raho sir hamari puri koshish yahi hai ki aapko achcha response mile aur aap lambe time tak jude rahe IndiaMART ke sath mein sir. Hame sir agar man lo hum agar aapko sir customer nahi de pa rahe hame kya mil jayega sir aap chalo ek baar paisa le liya aapko laga aap logo ki dua hai jinhone shuru kara tha mera bahut bada kaam ho gaya bahut mal hai.
Executive: Sir bilkul sir bhagwan se hum yahi dua karte hain aur aisa milna mushkil hai haan.
Executive: Hum log to sir yahi dua karenge bhagwan se ki aapka aur bhi bada kaam ho aur hum log puri koshish mein lage hue bhi hain sir isko lekar bas wahi hai ke sir kabhi kabhi thoda sa aap na jise bolte hain dhairya patience rakha kare patience rakhoge to sir aage definitely kaam hoga aap kabhi kabhi sir aisa hota hai.
Customer: 70 saal ka aadmi fauji aadmi do ladai lad chuka hun.
Executive: Are fir to sir bahut achi fir to sir bahut achcha laga aapse baat karke sir wo sir maine na abhi dekha sir aapka aap to mere padosi nikle.
Customer: Bache sare doctor hain hai na ek ha ek yahan pe do medical hai to bhaiya main free aadmi hun ye baat hai.
Executive: Achchi baat hai sir achcha laga aapse baat karke kaafi khushmizaj aap insan hain aur sir aap to mere ghar ke paas ke hi ho main bhi Rampur ka hi rehne wala hun sir.
Customer: Achcha achcha achcha to kabhi darshan dijiye pital nagri mein Kamardham kisiyon se maloom kar lo sava bigha ki building hai mark point hai haan sir haan chaliye actually achcha laga sir aapne mujhe invite kiya main kabhi agar us side aaunga Muradabad mein to agar meri hua mulakat ho payi to main koshish karunga mulakat karne ki aur kabhi sir aap bhi zaroor IndiaMART aaiyega kabhi aap Delhi aaye to aap IndiaMART zaroor aaiyega sir aap.
Customer: Theek hai bhaiya theek hai dhanyavad.
Executive: Theek hai baki sir aapke pass feedback ka sir abhi bhi sample leke ja raha hun main haan Meerut mein ek bahut bada deal hai ₹10 lakh ki wo unhone sample mangaya hai mera sample pass ho jayega kyunki NABL se pass hai mera.
Executive: Bahut achchi baat hai sir lekin main aapko ek baat batana chahunga bas IndiaMART se sir koi bhi buyer aapko mile aur wo aapko koi bhi jhasa de raha hai ya kuch de raha hai aap udhar mal mat dena sir usko.
Customer: Na udhar nahi.
Executive: Koi bhi customer sir aapko kitne bhi koi bhi customer aapse kitni bhi meethi meethi baatein kare kuch bhi kare lekin udhar mal nahi dena hai aapko.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai baki sir aapke pass na main abhi aapka ye concern close kar raha hun aapke pass ek email aayega to please sir wahan positive feedback apna share kar dijiyega sir. Haan positive theek aapki mail id par mail aayega to wahan satisfied aap share kijiyega satisfied apna feedback sir.
Customer: Theek hai bhaiya koi dikkat rehti hai aap mujhe call kar lijiyega isi number pe future mein bhi sir.
Executive: Theek hai bhaiya. Okay okay shukriya ji namaste sir.
Customer: Achcha namaste.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants large orders.

- Customer believes he receives sorted leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the lead allocation process.

- Executive explained the importance of small orders.

- Executive advised against giving credit to new buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide positive feedback via email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, orders, feedback, subscription
